name: Chef, yes Chef!
description:
Chef, yes Chef! is an artillery cooking game made during Ludum Dare 41. 

This is your big night, you're cooking for a critic! Fling ingredients across the kitchen as you follow the head chef's recipe. 

RIGHT CLICK to rotate camera angle, SPACE BAR to fire. 

Adoné Kitching (Game design, 3D modelling)
Ben McInnes (Game design, programming)
Ryan Mazzolini (SFX, programming)
Sarah-Jane Walton (Music)

If you enjoy Chef, yes Chef!, please let us know!
